critique: This document is an executive order that exempts an individual from compulsory retirement. It does not seem to have any implications for ideological tilt, immigration, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion. The only axis that it seems to affect is executive power, as it is an example of the executive branch using its authority to make a decision about an individual's employment. However, the scope of this action is very limited, so the expansion of executive power is minimal.
